context.rdfs:comment: A work of art that is primarily visual in character.
context.rdfs:label: VisualArtwork

properties.rdfs:comment: The material used. (e.g. Oil, Watercolour, Acrylic, Linoprint, Marble, Cyanotype, Digital, Lithograph, DryPoint, Intaglio, Pastel, Woodcut, Pencil, Mixed Media, etc.)
properties.rdfs:label: artMedium

properties.rdfs:comment: e.g. Painting, Drawing, Sculpture, Print, Photograph, Assemblage, Collage, etc.
properties.rdfs:label: artform

properties.rdfs:comment: The supporting materials for the artwork, e.g. Canvas, Paper, Wood, Board, etc.
properties.rdfs:label: artworkSurface

properties.rdfs:comment: The number of copies when multiple copies of a piece of artwork are produced - e.g. for a limited edition of 20 prints, 'artEdition' refers to the total number of copies (in this example "20").
properties.rdfs:label: artEdition

properties.rdfs:comment: A material used as a surface in some artwork, e.g. Canvas, Paper, Wood, Board, etc.
properties.rdfs:label: surface
